title: Florida Firm Recalls Cooked Pork Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 30, 2015 Morrison Meat Packers, a Miami, Fla. establishment, is recalling approximately 70,077 pounds of cooked pork products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains peanuts, a...
